content: comfort caps - 1 hr beanie this basic hat pattern is the perfect beginner s first hat it is very quick to make and is perfect for a last minute gift or for charity hook- size i/9- 5 50 mm or size h/8 5 00 mm for toddler/child size beanie yarn- red heart soft caron simply soft or any soft worsted weight yarn 1 skein is enough for 2-4 hats depending on size or size of skein note if the diameter is not what it should be at the points noted below you might be crocheting too tight and may need to loosen up or use a larger hook until you achieve the diameter sizes listed below do not change hook during project just start over using a bigger hook if needed gauge- 1st 2 rnds = 2 5 in diameter st = stitch double_crochet = double_crochet single_crochet = single_crochet chain = chain round = round slip_stitch = slip_stitch beg = beginning chain 2 does not count as double_crochet directions for newborn round 1- chain 4 9 double_crochet in 4th chain from hook join with slip_stitch in 2nd chain from the top of beg chain-4 10 double_crochet or create magic_ring chain 2 and 10 double_crochet join with slip_stitch in top of first double_crochet 10 double_crochet round 2- chain 2 2 double_crochet in first st 2 double_crochet in each double_crochet around join with slip_stitch in top of first double_crochet 20 double_crochet diameter should be 2 5 after this round round 3- chain 2 2 double_crochet in first st 1 double_crochet in next st 2 double_crochet in next double_crochet 1dc in next double_crochet around join with sl st in top of first double_crochet 30 double_crochet diameter should be 3 25 after this round round 4- chain 2 2 double_crochet in first st 1 double_crochet in next 2 sts 2 double_crochet in next double_crochet 1dc in each of the next 2 double_crochet around join with slip_stitch in top of first double_crochet 40 double_crochet diameter should be 4 00 after this round round 5-10- chain 2 1 double_crochet in next double_crochet and each double_crochet around join with slip_stitch in top of first double_crochet you should have enough rounds at after round 10 so that the hat height is 5 if not add more of this round until hat is 5 and then continue to round 11 round 11- chain 1 1 very loosely single_crochet in next double_crochet and each double_crochet around join with slip_stitch in open space between chain 1 and first single_crochet fasten_off and weave in ends directions for baby round 1- chain 4 9 double_crochet in 4th chain from hook join with slip_stitch in 2nd chain from the top of beg chain-4 10 double_crochet or create magic_ring chain 2 and 10 double_crochet join with slip_stitch in top of first double_crochet 10 double_crochet round 2- chain 2 2 double_crochet in first st 2 double_crochet in each double_crochet around join with slip_stitch in top of first double_crochet 20 double_crochet diameter should be 2 5
